title: An alternative to Gotham condensed ultra
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for a font that is near identical to Gotham Condensed Ultra. I would purchase this font from Hoefler but do not sell this font on it's own but combine it with the set for £500! Anyway, I would love to hear from someone who could suggest a couple of alternatives.

Many thanks,

Colin
author: mackleworth

comments.content: Hi Colin and welcome to Typophile. Try [talking to them](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144549/http:/www.typography.com/about/contact.php), they must be reasonable people. For an alternative; have a look at [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova/) by Mark Simonson.
